page.title: 13TOYS
page.content: Many{toys}children play with today are similar to those played with by their parents.{Boys}still have{cars, train- {sets,soldiers, guns}and{go-carts.Girls still enjoy{dolls and prams.}Toys however are now far superior.{Soldiers are called{Action Men}and have a wide range of modern equipment to choose from.{Dolls}too are different.They are {adult dolls}like{Sindy & Barbie.}They live in posh houses,drive big cars and have lots of lovely clothes. Also in 1985{bicycles}are still a big favourite.The boys in particular have their{B.M.X (Bicycle Motor Cross),}a sturdy machine built for stunt riding. Today children enjoy playing with a wide variety of{electronic products. {Robots}that can be programmed,{remote {controlled cars}and{computers}are familiar in most homes as are{C.B. {Radios}and{stereo tape recorders.
